title: The Murder of Fred Hampton (1971) [h33t][snach]
description:
--this is my own dvd capture of this great documentary--SNACH--

The Murder of Fred Hampton (1971)


Program Info
From the back of the dvd:
THE MURDER OF FRED HAMPTON began as a film portrait of Hampton and the Illinois Black Panther Party, but half way through the shoot, Hampton was murdered. In an infamous moment in Chicago history and politics, over a dozen policeman burst into Hampton's apartment while its occupants were sleeping, killing Hampton and fellow Panther Mark Clark and brutalizing the other occupants. Filmmakers Mike Gray and Howard Alk arrived a few hours later to shoot film footage of the crime scene that was later used to contradict news reports and police testimony. Recently restored and reworked by Gray, THE MURDER OF FRED HAMPTON is a chilling slice of American history.

U.S./1971/Black & White/Fullscreen/88mins./English. All-Zone NTSC DVD

Directors: Mike Gray, Howard Alk

Studio: FACETS - www.facets.org

DVD Release Date: May 22, 2007

2007 Chicago Doc Classic Award - Chicago International Documentary Festival
****"...political dynamite..." - Roger Ebert, Chicago Sun-Times
"...an example of the power of independent media in providing the truth..." - David Walker, Willamette Week Online
